title: Starling Cycles Beady Little Eye V3: A Shreddy 90 mm Travel Singlespeed
content:
Starling Cycles‘ singlespeed 90 mm travel full suspension bike just got a makeover. The Beady Little Eye V3 now comes with all of the V3 features found on the Murmur, Twist and Swoop frames. It’s a real one-of-a-kind and is Joe from Starling’s favorite bike of all time…

Beady Little Eye V3 Quick Hits

  • Wheels: Choose 27.5″, 29″ or Mullet
  • Travel: Rear: 90mm / Front: 110-140mm
  • Front triangle: Hand-built in Bristol, UK Reynolds 853 heat-treated tubing.
  • Rear triangle: Hand-built in the UK, heat-treated Chromoly.
  • Single-speed full suspension.
  • UK-made frame (front and rear) with Reynolds 853 front triangle.
  • Uses tensioners on the dropouts and pivots around the BB to maintain constant chain length and allow single-speed to work.
  • Features a new, Starling-design BB solution that increases bearing life and crank compatibility.
  • Updated to include V3 Starling features.
  • Available to order till 31st October 2024.

All the fun of a jibby full suspension bike in a smaller package and singlespeed, the Beady Little Eye is a perfect way to seek more trail engagement. The Beady is the choice of a special community of freaks and geeks. The enlightened few that know the more you subtract, the more you add.

The Beady V3 in “Steel is Teal” looks great!

The Beady is a full-suspension, single-speed mountain bike. But think of it as a hardtail with more grip and less chatter. It’s stupid fun and crazy fast.

 

﻿

It has 90mm of rear travel and is built with a Reynolds 853, UK-made front triangle and a UK-made, heat-treated Chromoly front triangle. It’s available with 27.5”, 29”, or mullet wheels and suits forks from 110mm to 140mm.
